QuestData.Title: Call of Air - Guse's Fleet
QuestData.CompletionText: We must prepare the new fleet of War Riders, $r! My riders are set to make a strike on the central battlefield; but first, I must wet their appetites - preparing them for the assault.$b$bI need enough Stormpike Soldier Flesh to feed a fleet! Hundreds of pounds! Surely you can handle that, yes? Get going!
QuestData.RewardText: The fleet feeds on their flesh. It consumes the enemy.$B$BFlight is imminent!
